caseTitle: Government of K.P. through Chief Secretary, Peshawar and others v. Maqsad Hayat
tagline: The terms and conditions of service of civil servants cannot be varied to their disadvantage or less favourable in view of Section 23 of Civil Servants Act, 1973. The payment of conveyance allowance to the teachers cannot be stopped during summer or winter vacations. Such act was illegal and discriminatory. Public functionaries are supposed to ensure the elimination of all forms of exploitation.
